means: 彻底的，全面的，充分的，彻头彻尾的，根本的，详尽的，严密的
非常精确的，（对细节）不厌其烦的

sentence.Network_en: The degree provides a thorough grounding in both mathematics and statistics.
sentence.Network_cn: 该学位课程将为数学和统计学打下扎实的基础。

sentence.Network_en: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。

sentence.Network_en: He uncoiled the hose and gave them a thorough drenching.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把软管铺展开来，把它们彻底冲洗了一下。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... this a.& pron.  这，这个 thorough a. 彻底的 though conj. 虽然，可是.

彻底（Thorough）：坚持不懈的做好每一件事，不放松，不懈怠。来自患者的评价：“My cardiac surgeon explained everything well. T…

list.abs: 学英语单词之二 ... 17. to rough it 忍耐过去 1. thorough burning 完全燃烧 8. No thoroughfare 禁止通行；此路不通.
overhaul的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... special overhauls 大修 thorough overhaul 彻底检修 top overhaul 大修.

9141 thorough overhaul 大修9142 thorough repair 大修9143 threadless fastening 无螺纹式（非螺纹式）扣结装置.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thuruh, alteration of thurh 'through'. Original use was as an adverb and preposition, in senses of through. The adjective dates from the late 15th cent., when it also had the sense 'that goes or extends through something', surviving in thoroughfare

entry.tran: (行为、活动)详细的，全面的，彻底的
entry.def: A thorough action or activity is one that is done very carefully and in a detailed way so that nothing is forgotten.

example.ex: We are making a thorough investigation...
example.tran: 我们正在进行彻底调查。

example.ex: This very thorough survey goes back to 1784...
example.tran: 这个非常全面的调查可追溯到 1784 年。

entry.def: Someone who is thorough is always very careful in their work, so that nothing is forgotten.

example.ex: Martin would be a good judge, I thought. He was calm and thorough...
example.tran: 我想，马丁将会是个优秀的法官，他做事沉稳，头脑严谨。

example.ex: The men were expert, thorough and careful.
example.tran: 那些人业务精通，作风严谨，态度认真。

entry.tran: 完全的，绝对的(用来强调程度)
entry.def: Thorough is used to emphasize the great degree or extent of something.

example.ex: I was a thorough little academic snob...
example.tran: 我那时是个目空一切、自以为是的小学术愤青。

example.ex: We regard the band as a thorough shambles.
example.tran: 我们认为那个乐队一塌糊涂。

auth_sentence.content: I will be deliberate and thorough in this process.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will be deliberate and thorough in this process.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will be deliberate and thorough in this process.

auth_sentence.content: A thorough wetting under a succession of heavy showers.
auth_sentence.res_content: A thorough wetting under a succession of heavy showers.

auth_sentence.content: He was good at diagnosing, and very thorough.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was good at diagnosing, and very thorough.

sentences.en: Give the room a thorough clean.

sentences.cn: 他是个地地道道的傻瓜。

jushi.chinese: 他是个地地道道的傻瓜。

jushi.english: The new employee seems to be a very thorough worker.
jushi.chinese: 新雇员办事看来十分认真。

jushi.english: Give the room a thorough clean.
